intro.description: In this tutorial, we'll run the model! Note -- you need to have installed the example models before proceeding, or have developed your own model first!

item.title: Select Prisoner's Dilemma Model
item.description: Select a model to execute. If you've imported the example projects (just run the "Load Sample Projects" cheatsheet) you can use the Prisoner's Dilemma Model.

item.title: Execute the model
item.description:
Now we can start the model in one of three ways.
  • Right-click and select "Execute" from the menu.
  • Select the "Execute" from the toolbar. (Our favorite)
  • Select "Execute" from the "Control" menu.
Or, if you hav the example models loaded, just select perform now.
